title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple WordPress Plugin Vulnerabilities

meta.title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple WordPress Plugin Vulnerabilities

chapters.title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple WordPress Plugin Vulnerabilities

sentences.text: MicroPayments Paid Author Subscriptions, Content, Downloads, Membership plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to carry out unintended actions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.
sentences.html: MicroPayments – Paid Author Subscriptions, Content, Downloads, Membership plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to carry out unintended actions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.

sentences.text: Modern Events Calendar Lite plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victims Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victims cookie-based authentication credentials.
sentences.html: Modern Events Calendar Lite plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim’s Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim’s cookie-based authentication credentials.

sentences.text: Upgrade to the latest version of WordPress Plugin, available from the WordPress Plugin Directory.
sentences.html: Upgrade to the latest version of WordPress Plugin, available from the WordPress Plugin Directory.
